headline: Vistra (VST) Gets Price Target Boost Amid Strong Energy Market Fundamentals
summary: Vistra Corp. (NYSE:VST) is one of the 10 AI Stocks Getting Wall Street’s Attention. On June 17, UBS raised the firm’s price target on the stock to $207 from $160 and kept a “Buy” rating on the shares. The price target raise reflects a “strong fundamental backdrop” for the power sector, the analysts noted. Other factors cited […]
